Prepare Files For Submission (DataCamp Task)

Source: R/u_task_names.R
u_prepare_assignment_dc.Rd

The function creates a folder (e.g.,pateikti-uzduoti-U00) and copies files indicated in sertifikatas and konspektas to that folder. The copied files are properly renamed. If needed, the function opens the folder and assignment submission webpage.

u_prepare_assignment_dc(
  uzduoties_nr,
  varianto_nr,
  specialybe,
  pavarde,
  vardas,
  sertifikatas,
  konspektas,
  dir_open = TRUE,
  emokymai_id = NULL
)

Arguments

uzduoties_nr

(integer)
varianto_nr

(integer)
specialybe

(string)
pavarde

(string)
vardas

(string)
sertifikatas

(string) Path to PDF file (certificate issued by DataCamp).
konspektas

(string) Path to PDF file.
emokymai_id

(integer) Open the directory with submission files.
open_dir

(TRUE|FALSE) Open the directory with submission files.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
u_prepare_assignment_dc(
  uzduoties_nr = 1,
  varianto_nr  = 000,
  specialybe   = "molekuline biologija",
  pavarde      = "Pavarde",
  vardas       = "Vardas Antras",
  sertifikatas = "pratybos/certificate.pdf",
  konspektas   = "pratybos/konspektas.pdf"
)
}
